Name: Combat Mentor
Effect: On Play - Empower an allied Unit.

Name: Flourish
Effect: [Overcast][Quick] Deal X damage to an opposing Unit. X equals the number of allied Units +1.

Name: Honored Flaguard
Effect: On Play - Summon a Knight Token.

Name: Reinforcements
Effect: [Overcast]n/Summon 2 Knight Tokens. Valor 10: Summon a Cavalier and a Knight Token instead.

Name: Pegasus Knight
Effect: On Play - [Overcast](2) Summon a Cavalier Token.

Name: Blade Strike
Effect: [Overcast]n/Give an allied Unit Rush. Valor 5: Empower that Unit.

Name: Shining Vanguard
Effect: On Play - Summon 2 Knight Tokens. Valor 5: Give them +0/+1.

Name: Dualblade Hero
Effect: [Rush]n/On Attack - Valor 5: Empower another allied Unit.

Name: Glimmering Warrior
Effect: On Play - Empower another allied Unit twice. If its an Infantry Unit, Empower it 3 times instead.

Name: Beauty Commander
Effect: On Play - Choose 1. Valor 10: Choose both instead:n/1) Summon 2 Knight Tokens and give them Rush.n/2)Empower all other allied Units.

Name: Angel of Glory, Athena
Effect: [Rush]n/On Play - Summon 2 Knight Tokens and give them Cover.n/On Attack - Empower all allied Infantry Units.

Name: Rallied Forces
Effect: Summon 5 Knight Tokens. Add any Units not summoned by this effect to your hand.

Name: Jack of Knights
Effect: On Play - If you have 4 or more other allied Units, Empower this Unit.

Name: zzz1
Effect: On Attack - If you have 2 or more other allied Units, Empower this Unit.

Name: zzz2
Effect: Empower up to 2 other allied Units.
